reviewText: This DVD was really good,all the girls are hot.
Not worth watching!  Don't bother renting and especially do not buy this DVD.  Only the first edition is worth watching.

If you're hoping to see Akira Lane in that blue teardrop microkini that she's wearing on the cover of this lame effort, here's a fair warning: You won't find any such scene in Ultra Vixens: Asians 4.  It's the ultimate bait-and-switch -- displaying an image on the outside jacket that's nowhere to be found within the video itself.  And in this case, what's the point?

Akira appears in the video anyway, wearing two other, entirely different bikinis, but neither one is anywhere near as sexy as the blue one that she's sporting on the cover.  Since it's not as if she isn't being shown in a state of undress anyway, why play games with the purchasers of the video by depicting one thing on the cover and delivering another with the product itself?

This kind of mindless and careless oversight on the part of the makers of productions like this one only serves to infuriate those who've shelled out money for such examples of false advertising, leaving them feeling ripped off and less likely to buy any offerings from the same manufacturer in the future.
great soft last scene with nicole oring and akira lane !  solo stuff not bad either
